# posDemux

The goal of posDemux is to provide tools for tools for handling reads
with combinatorial barcodes, and multiple adapter regions. This includes
utilities for demultiplexing, sequence segmenting and filtering. The
package is intended to work with single-cell RNA-seq data with multiple
barcoding (e.g. SPLiT-seq and PETRI-seq).

## Installation

You can install the development version of posDemux from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("yaccos/posDemux")
```

## Usage

Please see the package [vignettes](https://yaccos.github.io/posDemux/).

## Issues

Please use the repository’s issue tracker if you cannot make the package
work or if you have suggestions for improvements.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`bc_to_freq_cutoff()`](https://yaccos.github.io/posDemux/reference/bc_to_freq_cutoff.md)
  [`freq_to_bc_cutoff()`](https://yaccos.github.io/posDemux/reference/bc_to_freq_cutoff.md)
  : Convert between cutoff types
- [`combinatorial_demultiplex()`](https://yaccos.github.io/posDemux/reference/combinatorial_demultiplex.md)
  : Combinatorial demultiplexer
- [`create_freq_table()`](https://yaccos.github.io/posDemux/reference/create_freq_table.md)
  : Frequency table
- [`create_summary_res()`](https://yaccos.github.io/posDemux/reference/create_summary_res.md)
  [`print(`*`<demultiplex_filter_summary>`*`)`](https://yaccos.github.io/posDemux/reference/create_summary_res.md)
  : Create a summary of match filtering
- [`filter_demultiplex_res()`](https://yaccos.github.io/posDemux/reference/filter_demultiplex_res.md)
  : Filter demultiplexed reads
- [`freq_plot()`](https://yaccos.github.io/posDemux/reference/freq_plot.md)
  [`knee_plot()`](https://yaccos.github.io/posDemux/reference/freq_plot.md)
  : Diagnostic plots from demultiplexing
- [`interactive_bc_cutoff()`](https://yaccos.github.io/posDemux/reference/interactive_bc_cutoff.md)
  : Interactive cutoff selection
- [`row_match()`](https://yaccos.github.io/posDemux/reference/row_match.md)
  : Row matching of tables
- [`streaming_callbacks()`](https://yaccos.github.io/posDemux/reference/streaming_callbacks.md)
  : Suggested setup for FASTQ streaming
- [`streaming_demultiplex()`](https://yaccos.github.io/posDemux/reference/streaming_demultiplex.md)
  : Demultiplexing with streaming
